name: A Moving Experience
description:
Couldn't we all use a powerful, moving experience? Quite literally. Bob is a removalist worker, who by unfortunate happenstance finds himself trapped inside a building during an earthquake! In order to escape, he'll need to use his logic to push the various boxes into the right position to form a path.

Traverse this labyrinth of brick and mortar! Unravel the way through the map using tricky logic! In A Moving Experience, every box you push relates to the whole, and every small detail and element plays a part in the over-arching riddle. Everything has a purpose! Now that's moving!
